mapper.select: select u.id, u.name, u.code, u.content, u.ruletype, u.isnotify, u.realtime, u.sendtime, u.notify_phone, u.notify_email, u.insert_user, date_format(u.insert_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as insert_date, u.frequency, u.sampletime from sys_warnrule u where u.id = #{id}

select u.id, u.name, u.code, u.content, u.ruletype, u.isnotify, u.realtime, u.sendtime, u.notify_phone, u.notify_email, u.insert_user, date_format(u.insert_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as insert_date, u.frequency, u.sampletime from sys_warnrule u where u.name = #{name}

select u.id, u.name, u.code, u.content, u.ruletype, u.isnotify, u.realtime, u.sendtime, u.notify_phone, u.notify_email, u.insert_user, date_format(u.insert_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as insert_date, u.frequency, u.sampletime from sys_warnrule u where u.code = #{code}

select u.id, u.name, u.code, u.content, u.ruletype, u.isnotify, u.realtime, u.sendtime, u.notify_phone, u.notify_email, u.insert_user, date_format(u.insert_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as insert_date, u.frequency, u.sampletime from sys_warnrule u order by insert_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_warnrule (id, name,code, content,ruletype, isnotify, realtime,sendtime,notify_phone,notify_email,insert_user,insert_date,frequency,sampletime) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{code},#{content},#{ruletype}, #{isnotify}, #{realtime},#{sendtime},#{notify_phone},#{notify_email},#{insert_user},#{insert_date},#{frequency},#{sampletime})
mapper.update:
update sys_warnrule
notify_phone = #{notify_phone}, notify_email = #{notify_email}, sendtime = #{sendtime}, ruletype = ${ruletype}, frequency = #{frequency},
name = #{name},
code = #{code},
sampletime = #{sampletime},
content = #{content},
isnotify = #{isnotify},
realtime = #{realtime}
where id = #{id}

delete from sys_warnrule where id in
